Class QuadraticEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuadraticEquation

  • public class QuadraticEquation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Quadratic Equation, including a solver for these equations.
    Author:
    Jose A. Rodriguez Rivera

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      QuadraticEquation(float a, float b, float c)
      Constructs a Quadratic Equation.

      Returns the equation in a String format.

      Calculates the real solutions, and returns them in a FLOATPair type.
      int realSolutionsCount()
      Calculates the number of real solutions of a Quadratic Equation.

      • QuadraticEquation

        public QuadraticEquation(float a,
                         float b,
                         float c)
        Constructs a Quadratic Equation.
        Parameters:
        a - the x^2 coefficient (has to be non-zero)
        b - the x coefficient
        c - the constant
